00030 #include "CuboidMeshConstructor.hpp"
00031 #include "UblasCustomFunctions.hpp"
00032 
00033 
00035 // Implementation
00037 
00038 
00039 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00040 void CuboidMeshConstructor<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>::ConstructHyperCube(AbstractTetrahedralMesh<1,SPACE_DIM>& rMesh, unsigned width)
00041 {
00042     rMesh.ConstructLinearMesh(width);
00043 }
00044 
00045 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00046 void CuboidMeshConstructor<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>::ConstructHyperCube(AbstractTetrahedralMesh<2,2>& rMesh, unsigned width)
00047 {
00048     rMesh.ConstructRectangularMesh(width, width);
00049 }
00050 
00051 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00052 void CuboidMeshConstructor<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>::ConstructHyperCube(AbstractTetrahedralMesh<3,3>& rMesh, unsigned width)
00053 {
00054     rMesh.ConstructCuboid(width, width, width);
00055 }
00056 
00057 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00058 void CuboidMeshConstructor<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>::Construct(AbstractTetrahedralMesh<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>& rMesh, unsigned meshRefinementNum, double meshWidth)
00059 {
00060     //The class has only been tested for ELEMENT_DIM == SPACE_DIM or ELEMENT_DIM == 1 && SPACE_DIM == 3
00061     assert(ELEMENT_DIM == SPACE_DIM || (ELEMENT_DIM == 1 && SPACE_DIM == 3));
00062 
00063     mMeshWidth = meshWidth;
00064     assert(meshRefinementNum < 30); //Sanity
00065 
00066     // Create the mesh
00067     unsigned mesh_size = (unsigned) SmallPow(2, meshRefinementNum+2); // number of elements in each dimension
00068     double scaling = mMeshWidth/(double) mesh_size;
00069     ConstructHyperCube(rMesh, mesh_size);
00070     rMesh.Scale(scaling, scaling, scaling);
00071     mNumElements = rMesh.GetNumElements();
00072     mNumNodes = rMesh.GetNumNodes();
00073 }
00074 
00075 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00076 double CuboidMeshConstructor<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>::GetWidth()
00077 {
00078     return mMeshWidth;
00079 }
00080 
00081 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00082 unsigned CuboidMeshConstructor<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>::GetNumElements()
00083 {
00084     return mNumElements;
00085 }
00086 
00087 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00088 unsigned CuboidMeshConstructor<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>::GetNumNodes()
00089 {
00090     return mNumNodes;
00091 }

00099 template class CuboidMeshConstructor<1>;
00100 template class CuboidMeshConstructor<2>;
00101 template class CuboidMeshConstructor<3>;
00102 template class CuboidMeshConstructor<1,3>;
